title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

text: IX. THE PREACHERS OF DEATH.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: Full is the earth of the superfluous; marred is life by the
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

text: eternal"!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: There are the terrible ones who carry about in themselves the beast of
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: desistance from life, and pass away themselves!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: they begin to die, and long for doctrines of lassitude and renunciation.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

text: coffins!

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

text: clinging to it.

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: are we fools! And that is the foolishest thing in life!"
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: X. WAR AND WARRIORS.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: By our best enemies we do not want to be spared, nor by those either
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: whom we love from the very heart. So let me tell you the truth!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: My brethren in war! I love you from the very heart. I am, and was ever,
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: your counterpart. And I am also your best enemy. So let me tell you the
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: truth!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: I know the hatred and envy of your hearts. Ye are not great enough not
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: to know of hatred and envy. Then be great enough not to be ashamed of
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: them!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: And if ye cannot be saints of knowledge, then, I pray you, be at least
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: its warriors. They are the companions and forerunners of such saintship.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: I see many soldiers; could I but see many warriors! "Uniform" one
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: calleth what they wear; may it not be uniform what they therewith hide!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: Ye shall be those whose eyes ever seek for an enemy--for YOUR enemy. And
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: with some of you there is hatred at first sight.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: Your enemy shall ye seek; your war shall ye wage, and for the sake of
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: your thoughts! And if your thoughts succumb, your uprightness shall
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: still shout triumph thereby!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: Ye shall love peace as a means to new wars--and the short peace more
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: than the long.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: You I advise not to work, but to fight. You I advise not to peace, but
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: to victory. Let your work be a fight, let your peace be a victory!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: One can only be silent and sit peacefully when one hath arrow and bow;
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: otherwise one prateth and quarrelleth. Let your peace be a victory!
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: Ye say it is the good cause which halloweth even war? I say unto you: it
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: is the good war which halloweth every cause.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: War and courage have done more great things than charity. Not your
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: sympathy, but your bravery hath hitherto saved the victims.
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: "What is good?" ye ask. To be brave is good. Let the little girls say:
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: "To be good is what is pretty, and at the same time touching."
title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

text: misunderstand one another. I know you.

title: Thus Spake Zarathustra: A Book for All and None
author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm

author: Nietzsche, Friedrich Wilhelm
